name: Interactive Cat Toy Set
imageAlt: Assorted interactive cat toys including feather wands, balls, and crinkle toys
shortDescription: A curated set of interactive toys to keep your indoor cat entertained for hours.
description: Indoor cats need stimulation to stay happy and healthy, and this 10-piece toy set delivers variety they will never get bored of. From feather wands to crinkle balls and spring toys, every piece is designed to trigger your cat's natural hunting instincts. Rotate through the set to keep playtime fresh and exciting.
features: 10-piece assortment including feather wands, crinkle balls, and springs
Bright colours and textures stimulate hunting instincts
Durable materials withstand aggressive play sessions
Compact storage pouch keeps toys organised between sessions
Safe, non-toxic materials tested to international pet toy standards
